entry.title: The U.N. Is Central to Life in Gaza. Now Its Mission There Is Collapsing.
entry.content: As fighting rages between Israel and Hamas, an agency said its functions would ”start gradually collapsing” as ambulances, sewage and sanitation systems shut down.

entry.title: Israeli Troops Come Under Fire as They Raid Main Gaza Hospital
entry.content: The Israeli military carried out the operation after the U.S. said its intelligence showed Hamas fighters were operating from the hospital compound.
